bill.summary: Commemorates the 40th anniversary of the ALS Association Greater Philadelphia Chapter. (Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, also known as ALS or Lou Gehrig's disease, is a progressive neurodegenerative disease that causes muscle weakness and leads to death.)
